response.overview: Thiago Monte is a lustful Parisian psychologist who realizes the fantasies of his patients including Gabriel Phoenix, who thinks he is a wild animal. After an unbridled fuck between the two protagonists, they turn around and remake the 90's with Eden Frost who gives mouth and butt to Edward Scott and the new kid on the team Ridley Dovarez. Finally, Thiago has hardly recovered from his emotional job change to become a perverse real estate agent ready to do anything to satisfy his fantasies. Axel Xave, a beautiful Austrian, is looking for an apartment and will give him, his mouth and ass to get the rental.
response.title: Petites Baises Parisiennes
